summary: The diff successfully implements all BuildRequest requirements. A loading screen with animation displays on app launch, transitions to the main gallery after 2.5 seconds, and the gallery shows cars and engines with 'Buy Now' buttons and pricing. The design follows a premium automotive showroom theme with metallic color palettes, proper typography, and consistent styling across all views.

hallucinated_features.description: Filter functionality to show 'All', 'Cars', or 'Engines' in the gallery
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify filtering capabilities. REQ-2 only requires displaying car and engine photos in an organized gallery, not filtering them.

hallucinated_features.description: 'Details' button alongside 'Buy Now' button on each car card
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only specifies 'Buy' text and price display. Additional action buttons were not requested.
BuildRequest does not specify visual categorization badges. REQ-2 only requires displaying the images.

hallucinated_features.description: Hover effects with image scaling and gradient overlays on product cards
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify interactive hover states. REQ-4 mentions premium styling but does not explicitly require hover animations.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution with quote and social media icons
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify footer content or attribution requirements.
